description:
Xiao Junguang is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

A midfielder of team China.
He has watched tournament games as he accompanies his grandfather visiting the U.S. for some matters.
He is open-minded usually but is also an individualist hating to work in groups.
His playstyle centers on hitting back opponentâ€™s shots.
name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Xiao Junguang
